resource: My Top Secrets to Picking the Perfect Option Contract

verdict_reason: Added 4 missing validation checks: Delta/Theta ratio, Open Interest, Bid-Ask spread, ATR-based expiration timing. Directly improves trade quality.

rule_1_position_sizing.giannino_rule: Max 10% of buying power per trade

rule_2_theta_decay_limit.giannino_rule: Theta < 10% of contract price per day

rule_3_itm_preference.our_implementation: We SELL OTM (30-delta) for credit spreads - correct for our strategy
